version_description:
* Optimizations for iOS7
* Added Italian localization

* fixed traditional Chinese localization
* fixed wheel sharing on iPad

* added bulk label import: now you can add large label lists right from the clipboard
* added arabic localization

New features:

* Completely new flat-looking user interface
* Dark / light themes
* New stunning color schemes
* New app icon
* Import / export: share your wheels with your friends or transfer between your devices
* Quick-stop option
* Shake to randomise
* New label deactivation workflow
* Deactivated labels will be stored with the wheel

* Fixed bulk import
* Other bugfixes and improvements

* optimized to iPhone X
* fixed some UI issues

New in version 2.1:

* Made the creation of labels quicker and more simple
* Fixed the issue with disappearing sound
* Changed the way how wheel images will be shared
